tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE DiversityData (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    department VARCHAR(50),
    gender VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    ethnicity VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE employees (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    ethnicity VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE diversity_stats (
    data_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    department VARCHAR(50),
    gender_diversity DECIMAL,
    ethnicity_diversity DECIMAL,
    total_employees INT,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE demographic_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  age INT,
  department VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE diversity_stats (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  year INT,
  gender_diversity FLOAT,
  ethnicity_diversity FLOAT,
  department_diversity FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE employees (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    gender CHAR,
    age INT
);

CREATE TABLE employee_demographics (
    id int PRIMARY KEY,
    name varchar(50),
    age int,
    gender varchar(10),
    ethnicity varchar(50)
)

CREATE TABLE department_demographics (
    id int PRIMARY KEY,
    department_name varchar(50),
    total_employees int,
    female_employees int,
    male_employees int
)

CREATE TABLE region_demographics (
    id int PRIMARY KEY,
    region_name varchar(50),
    total_employees int,
    diversity_score float
)

CREATE TABLE diversity_metrics (
    id int PRIMARY KEY,
    metric_name varchar(50),
    metric_value float
)

CREATE TABLE employee_ratings (
    id int PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id int,
    performance_rating float,
    diversity_rating float
)
